feed.title: Documenso Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add new colors by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1224
  • chore: update signup text by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1234
  • chore: blog-basic-signing-and-roles by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1241
  • fix: typo in pricing table by @poeck in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1239
  • fix: API token deletion not reflected in cache until page reload by @cchirag in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1128
  • chore: changelog-160 by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1247
  • chore: team stuff by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1228
  • fix: correct grammar on enterprise page by @mark-pitblado in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1252
  • feat: initial i18n marketing implementation by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1223
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1253
  • chore: translation typo by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1255
  • chore: rename "none" document access to "no restrictions" by @raikasdev in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1138
  • fix: truncation of titles to fix UI breaks by @rhit-daviscl in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1162
  • fix: dateformat api bug by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1238
  • fix: add new environmental variables for render deployment by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1174
  • chore: last touches by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1263
  • fix: use native URL parser instead of wrong regex by @aeris in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1206
  • feat: allow oidc only signup and trust mail addresses by @Rainson12 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1208
  • feat: make oidc sign in button text configurable by @Rainson12 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1209
  • fix: limits syncing issue by @emmpaz in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1195
  • fix: fields name/label on dark mode by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1242
  • chore: Update .env.example commenting by @sjacobflaherty in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1257
  • fix: show signup option only to users without existing accounts by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1221
  • fix: radio and checkbox fields issues with empty values by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1273
  • fix: support dynamic external ids for direct templates by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1274
  • fix: download audit log certificate by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1268
  • feat: add initials field type by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1279

New Contributors

  • @poeck made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1239
  • @cchirag made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1128
  • @mark-pitblado made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1252
  • @raikasdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1138
  • @rhit-daviscl made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1162
  • @aeris made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1206
  • @emmpaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1195
  • @sjacobflaherty made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1257

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: move sealing to a background job by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1287
  • feat: advanced fields article by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1276
  • feat: copy and paste fields by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1193
  • feat: automatically set public profile url for OIDC users by @Rainson12 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1225
  • feat: update the email templates to reflect team-specific information. by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1229
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1295
  • chore: update readme for manual self-hosting by @alessiodam in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1270
  • docs: Fix documentation typo regarding the Webhook secret header by @yigitkeremoktay in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1278
  • feat: prefill fields via api by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1261
  • feat: web i18n by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1286
  • fix: dialog close on refresh by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1135
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1305
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1306
  • fix: make invite and confirmations long lived by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1309
  • fix: broken pages by translation tags by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1312
  • feat: disable 2fa with backup codes by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1314
  • feat: update createFields api endpoint by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1311
  • chore: upgrade next by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1300
  • fix: a grammer error by @apsinghdev in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1316
  • feat: embed signing experience by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1322
  • fix: show the existing field meta when editing a template fields by @Etrenak in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1323
  • fix: broken endpoint to update a field in a document by @Etrenak in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1319
  • chore: add docs for translations by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1310
  • feat: Added Elestio as one-click deploy option by @kaiwalyakoparkar in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1302
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1308
  • fix: changed the default file path for NEXT_PRIVATE_SIGNING_LOCAL_FILâ€¦ by @binary-amigo in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1277
  • feat: allow recipient to select signature color by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1325
  • feat: add and use NEXT_PRIVATE_INTERNAL_WEBAPP_URL by @david-loe in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1298
  • chore: embedding blog post by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1329

New Contributors

  • @alessiodam made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1270
  • @yigitkeremoktay made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1278
  • @apsinghdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1316
  • @Etrenak made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1323
  • @kaiwalyakoparkar made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1302
  • @binary-amigo made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1277

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.6.1...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: refactor dates by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1321
  • feat: marketing cta by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1335
  • fix: select field ux by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1334
  • fix: prefill advanced field settings with current field meta in template by @Etrenak in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1332
  • feat: add authOptions to the API by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1338
  • fix: template with empty advanced fields by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1339
  • fix: template with empty advanced fields backend by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1340
  • feat: add language switcher by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1337
  • feat: signing order by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1290
  • fix: fix passkeys page-breaking error by @apsinghdev in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1348
  • feat: document visibility by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1262
  • feat: support smaller field bounds by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1344
  • chore: add document visibility section by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1352
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1327
  • chore: smaller text in signature pad by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1351
  • fix: completed signing page layout by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1349
  • fix: add check for invalid locales by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1353

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.7.0...v1.7.1

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1354
  • feat: add french by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1355
  • feat: allow editing pending documents by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1346
  • fix: set lang cookie expiry by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1365
  • chore: prisma customer story on blog by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1366
  • fix: dateformat bug by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1372
  • chore: field fonts by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1350
  • fix: carousel slide change handling and video reset by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1364
  • chore: Go Fork Yourself blog article by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1375
  • chore: open page data update by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1380
  • fix: show the full count of documents by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1382
  • feat: add recipient email in activity log by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1386
  • chore: add translation contribution docs by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1379
  • feat: search documents by name or recipient name or recipient email by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1384
  • fix: external id null for documents created from templates by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1362
  • feat: highlight problematic fields by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1330
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1359
  • fix: stacked avatar colors by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1361
  • fix: improve lingui configuration by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1388
  • chore: cal.com customer story article by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1396
  • feat: start the work on the API reference by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1392
  • feat: add custom font sizes to fields by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1376
  • feat: add typed signature by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1357
  • fix: close direct link dialog when you click on save by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1412
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1406
  • feat: add team user management endpoints to api by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1416
  • chore: enable spanish by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1417
  • fix: trigger webhook when a direct link signer signs a document by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1409
  • chore: show signing order when creating a document from template by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1410
  • fix: translate extract command by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1394
  • style: Update web.po by @astrakid in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1403
  • style: Update common.po by @astrakid in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1402
  • fix: translation upload token by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1423
  • feat: improve translation coverage by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1427
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1433
  • fix: duplicate templates by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1434
  • fix: missing signing order when using templates by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1425
  • fix: missing not found page for deleted documents by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1424
  • feat: i18n for emails by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1442
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1443

New Contributors

  • @astrakid made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1403

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add template page by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1395
  • feat: add certificate translations by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1440
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1444
  • fix: checkout loading button by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1445
  • feat(email): support configurable SMTP service by @Jorgagu in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1447
  • fix: update docker environment by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1438
  • feat: add signing link copy by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1449
  • fix: custom team email subject by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1450
  • fix: email translations by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1454
  • feat: add document distribution setting by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1437
  • feat: add global settings for teams by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1391
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1451
  • chore: project babel by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1420
  • fix: fix the document url in the command menu search by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1453
  • fix: certificate translations by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1460
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1461
  • fix: update publish workfow to only tag stable versions latest by @david-loe in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1405
  • fix: errors moving fields by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1429
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1463
  • feat: signature rejection by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1472
  • fix: always allow access to billing by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1476
  • feat: support windows for 2fa tokens by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1478
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1474
  • fix: sort recipients for template with signing order by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1468

New Contributors

  • @Jorgagu made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1447

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.7.2...v1.8.0
